welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Welling, a charming town known for its beautiful parks and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport provides exclusive services for private and business jet passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIPs and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport primarily serves international flights and is home to a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport primarily serves domestic and European flights and offers a wide range of facilities including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speed and unlimited access.
